item.title: Platform specific build event
item.description: Sometimes you need to build .net solution/project on different platforms (for example while developing xamarin based application). In that case pre/post build events may contain platform specific instructions. To handle this situation you can use ‘Condition’ attribute and ‘OS’ variable, for example, like this: <PostBuildEvent Condition=" '$(OS)' == 'Windows_NT' "> <!-- windows specifics --> copy $(TargetPath) $(ProjectDir)../Assemblies /Y </PostBuildEvent> <PostBuildEvent Condition=" '$(OS)' == 'Unix' "> <!-- *nix, mac specifics --> cp -f $(TargetPath) $(ProjectDir).
